author: Web Team
title: Watch: Man jumps onto live train tracks to save boy - Khaleej Times
text: Watch: Man jumps onto live train tracks to save boy Web Team /Russia Filed on February 21, 2017 Share Vote The whole incident occurs in few seconds A young man in Russia saved the life of a little boy by jumping onto the live train track. According to the NDTV, the incident was reported in the central Russian city of Yekaterinburg. The CCTV footage of the incident shows the little boy accidently falling onto the railway track. The boy tries to get up but fails. Crowd of passengers gather at the scene as the helpless boy struggles to get out. Suddenly a young boy jumps down on the track and saves the boy. The crowd is thrilled by the bravery of the man. The whole incident occurs in few seconds. Share
